# Introduction

VueFormulate is a utility package for Vue applications that makes creating forms incredibly easy. Forms can be tedious and frustrating to configure, especially when integrating front end form validation. VueFormulate solves this problem by exposing a clean API for generating forms and form elements. It is also tightly integrated with Vuex to ensure that your formâ€™s state is always available to the entire application.

# How it works

VueFormulate exposes two components for use in your templates <formulate> and <formulate-element>. These two components work together to provide a declarative syntax for defining your forms, form elements, validation, labels, help text, and vuex access. Each form input is bound directly to the your vuex store, giving you a full representation of your form's data and validation state at all times.

All <formulate-element> components must be nested inside a <formulate> element.

<template>
  <formulate
    name="myform"
  >
  </formulate>
</template>
